required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Italian Coronary Artery Aneurysm and Ectasia In Patients With Acute Coronary Syndrome
clinical_study.official_title: ITAlian Coronary Artery Aneurysm and Ectasia Observational Study in Patients With Acute Coronary Syndrome: The ITACA Registry

brief_summary.textblock: The ITACA study is a prospective, observational no profit registry enrolling patients with Acute Coronary Syndrome and angiographic evidence of coronary aneurysms and/or ectasia.

detailed_description.textblock: The ITACA study is aimed at evaluating short and long term outcomes in patients with acute coronary sindrome and angiographic evidence of coronary aneurysm and/or actasia. Data regarding safety and effectiveness of invasive and pharmacological treatment strategies will be also collected.

primary_outcome.description: A composite endpoint of myocardial infarction, stroke, cardiovascular death, myocardial revascularization and hospitalisation due to cardiovascular events

study_pop.textblock: patients undergoing coronary angiography with diagnosis of ACS and contextual detection of coronary ectasia or aneurysm in accordance with the definitions specified below. Patients with coronary pseudoaneurysms are excluded.
